paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Phe33Leu, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, neuropathy, nephropathy, severe heart failure

individual_records.phenotype_details: presented with dyspnoea on exertion, diagnosed with hypertrophic cardiomyopathy, later developed neuropathy and nephropathy
individual_records.evidence_sentence: We describe a physically active 46-year-old man who presented with dyspnoea on exertion.

functional_data.summary: The Phe33Leu mutation is associated with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: The variant has been previously described in only five case reports.
key_quotes: Hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis caused by the rare mutation ATTR Phe33Leu, previously described in only five case reports.

extraction_metadata.notes: Data was extracted from the main text, with no tables present.
